I would like to make an offer of 180 Euros per month for the same apartment.

I think that's a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in New York City and I am confident that I can make this offer attractive to you.

content:
Thank you for your offer of 180 Euros per month, Mary Smith. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I would like to clarify that the original rental price that I agreed upon is 200 Euros per month. I believe that this price is fair and reasonable for a 25 square meter apartment in New York City.

I understand that you would like to make the offer in writing, and I would be happy to do the same. However, I would like to reiterate that the rental price for the apartment is 200 Euros per month. If you would like to discuss this further, please let me know.
